ygData.subject: RE: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:Does CHR affect Largos?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hrm... Interesting. Maybe you have something here. My friend has a level 27 cleric that she plays sometimes. I was watching over her shoulder and they had
ygData.messageBody:
>On Thu, Feb 10/00, Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...> wrote:
>> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

>> > When we were first exploring lower guk, back when there was 8-10 ppl in
>> > the zone, I used lullaby at least once on an over pull in the undead
>> > tower. It worked and we all lived.

>> With your knowledge of Lullaby now, would you even consider firing
>> up that song in LGuk? Lullaby was awesome when I used it, oh about
>> 30 levels ago. I can't even keep 3 snakes asleep now.

Hrm... Interesting. Maybe you have something here.

My friend has a level 27 cleric that she plays sometimes. I was watching
over her shoulder and they had a mid-20s bard in their group in Sol A.
Lullaby was working beautifully for him on the train of goblins they had
stopped (most of which was giving the lvl 27 experience) So it may well
be true this is a song that stops working as well as you got up in levels.

When I used it on aviaks that were red to me with the level 16 version of
my bard, it worked well enough as well.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 8(!) HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (dying
to giant wasps in Misty Thicket)
